page.title: 16VANDALISM
page.content: One of the least attractive features of Kirkby is vandalism. Many of the shops outside of the town centre have their windows completely boarded up because they have been smashed so many times. Many bus shelters have been smashed and sometimes bus drivers refuse to drive through parts of Kirkby because stones have been thrown at their buses. Graffiti defaces houses and buildings in all areas of the town. This is very rarely obscene, but usually consists of nicknames and names of football teams and pop groups. Finally, many people do not use litterbins or council tips, so the grass verges are full of litter and in some cases old chairs and beds.
